# Work Experience

```{r consulting}
         "Create synthetic datasets and document code in Github."
```

# Data Analytics Projects

## Visualizations and Analyses

```{r projects}
tribble(
  ~ when, ~ title, ~ details, ~ where, ~ url,
  "Tableau", "Employee Exit Survey Dashboard", "Trends in company's attrition rates visualized in an interactive dashboard.", "UK NHS", "tinyurl.com/tableau-employee-dashboard",
  "R", "Analyzing Soccer Matches from the 2018-2019 English Premier League", "Determining the top performing soccer teams and possible predictors of winning.", "ISF", "https://tinyurl.com/soccer-analysis",
  "R", "How hot has it gotten in the Philippines?", "Animated visualization of the temperature in each Philippine region in the last century.", "MelbURN meetup", "https://github.com/MartinaGiron/R-Portfolio/tree/main/Philippines-AveTemp-Over-Time",
  "R", "Mapping Discrimination Against Lesbians in Europe", "Mapping the proportion of lesbians who personally felt discriminated against or harassed on the grounds of gender.", "ISF", "https://github.com/MartinaGiron/R-Portfolio/tree/main/tidyrainbow-map",
) %>% 
  brief_entries(glue::glue("\\textbf{<title>}: <details> \\newline \\url{<url>}", .open = "<", .close = ">"), when, .protect = FALSE)
```


## Articles for Towards Data Science

```{r articles}
tribble(
  ~ when, ~ title, ~ details, ~ where, ~ url,

) %>% 
  brief_entries(glue::glue("\\textbf{<title>}: <details> \\newline \\url{<url>}", .open = "<", .close = ">"), when, .protect = FALSE)
```
